title: Wireless PHY Systems Engineer
summary: As a Wireless PHY Systems Engineer, you will be a core member of our highly innovative and visible Wireless System-on-Chip (SoC) design team...
description: You will work closely with other PHY systems and algorithm engineers, analog and digital designers, FW & SW Engineers in the areas above...
preferred_qualifications: Experience with fixed-point design and RTL vector generation is a plus. Experience with handling and processing large amounts of field and simulation data...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow...
